levels.description: All ally units within range gain <@ba.vup>+1</> Block, and <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{def:0%}</> of Heidi's DEF and <@ba.vup>{max_hp:0%}</> of Heidi's max HP. This unit's Trait effect is increased to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</>
